name: Pixel World
description:
This is the action game that you color all of panels.

The production is simple, but you can enjoy exhilarating actions by run, hit the enemy, spin the enemy.

You can enjoy various actions, lift the panel, throw the panel, use the panel as a shield, glide, walk on the water, place the panel's bombs.

There are four areas in total, and there are six stages in each area.
There are bosses in each area.

Clear time is 1, 2 hours, but I think that it is best for a little refreshing.
